articles.title: Nick Kyrgios Returns to Tennis in Brisbane
articles.summary: Nick Kyrgios is a tennis player from Australia who is coming back to play in a big tournament called the Brisbane International. He has not played in many matches this year because he has been injured. Before the Brisbane tournament, he will play a special match against a top women's player named Aryna Sabalenka on TV. This match is called a Battle of the Sexes and some people like it while others do not. Kyrgios is also getting ready to play in other events, including the Australian Open, which is a very important tournament. He needs special permission to play because his ranking is low due to his injuries. This is exciting news for tennis fans who want to see him play again.

articles.title: A New Big Theme Park in the UK
articles.summary: Universal Studios is planning to build a huge new theme park in the UK near Bedford. The government has approved the plan, and it could open by 2031. This park will be very big, with tall rides and lots of visitors expected. Some people are excited because it might bring fun and jobs, but others are worried about traffic and noise. For example, a local named Claudia Pixley thinks it's a bad idea because the roads are small and could get crowded. Universal says most people in the area support the park. The goal is to make it as popular as Disneyland Paris in France, which is a famous theme park. This project is a big opportunity for the UK to have more entertainment options for families.

articles.title: The Best Music of 2025: Surprises and Favorites
articles.summary: In 2025, music critics picked their favorite albums and songs. They looked at lists from many music magazines to find the top music. Big stars like Taylor Swift did not get many votes. Instead, new artists like Addison Rae and older ones like Lily Allen were chosen. Addison Rae made a pop album with songs about wanting things like fame and peace. Lily Allen sang about a broken marriage in her songs. The critics liked music that was different and exciting, not just popular. This guide helps us learn about the best music of the year.

articles.title: Kate Winslet's Story: Dealing with Media Attention
articles.summary: Kate Winslet is a famous actress who became a star after acting in the movie Titanic. She talks about how the media and photographers followed her everywhere, which made her feel scared and unhappy. They looked through her trash and asked stores about her shopping to guess what she ate. To feel better, she did simple things like having a good meal, talking with friends, listening to music, and going to the bathroom. She also remembers being teased about her body when she was younger and seeing her pictures changed in magazines. Winslet says support from friends helped her through tough times.

articles.title: Thomas Skinner Says BBC Cheated on Strictly Vote
articles.summary: Thomas Skinner, a former contestant on the TV show Strictly Come Dancing, says the BBC cheated in the vote that made him leave the show. He got an email that he says was from a BBC boss, showing he got more votes than it looked like. The email also said the BBC was upset because he met a US Vice-President. The BBC says the vote is checked by an independent company to make sure it is fair, and they deny cheating. Skinner is not going to the show's final and says he wants people to know why. He says he checked the email was real, but the BBC hasn't seen it. This is a story about a disagreement over a TV show vote.

articles.title: Ice Cream Boss Says Company Tried to Hurt Her
articles.summary: Anuradha Mittal was the chair of Ben & Jerry's, a famous ice cream company. She says that Magnum, the company that owns Ben & Jerry's, threatened to say bad things about her if she did not leave her job. This happened because there was a big fight about how independent Ben & Jerry's board should be. The board wants to keep making decisions about social issues, like helping people and peace. Magnum said Mittal did not meet the rules to stay on the board anymore and made new rules, like limiting how long people can serve. Other board members also had to leave. Mittal talked to the BBC about this problem, saying she has been trying to protect Ben & Jerry's mission for years.
